text: José Daniel Guccione (7 February 1952 - 26 February 2021) was an Argentine politician and physician. He was a Deputy from 2011 to 2015. He was born in Posadas, Argentina. Guccione was a member of the Front for the Renewal of Concord. Guccione died on 26 February 2021 at a hospital in Posadas from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 69.Falleció por coronavirus José "Pepe" Guccione, subsecretario del Ministerio de Salud ==References== Category:Argentine politicians Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Argentina
title: José Guccione
